meanings.definition: The art or practice of sewing or embroidering.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed creating beautiful stitcheries in her free time.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of intricate stitcheries from different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The stitcheries on her dress made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her stitcheries were like a colorful tapestry woven with threads of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The stitcheries she made were so detailed, they seemed to come to life.

meanings.definition: A piece of needlework, especially one that is decorative or ornamental.
meanings.sent1: She framed the delicate stitcheries and hung them on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The pillow was adorned with beautiful stitcheries of flowers and birds.
meanings.sent3: The stitcheries on the tablecloth added a touch of elegance to the dining room.
meanings.sent4: Her stitcheries were like tiny jewels sparkling on the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The stitcheries on the quilt were so intricate, they mesmerized anyone who saw them.
